Title: That'll Be the Day
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Kay Oyegun, Don Roos, Kay Oyegun (story editor), Jas Waters (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Kevin helps Randall and Beth with a project; Kate contemplates a big gift for Toby; Jack and Rebecca talk about their future.
